summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the improvement of DARTMOUTH AVENUE WEST from West Blaine Street to approximately 100 feet northeasterly thereof; and certain other easements, by constructing sanitary sewers together with the necessary appurtenances and an interceptor sewer in West Garfield Street from Magnolia Way West to an existing METRO sanitary trunk sewer approximately 1370 feet easterly thereof, Local Improvement District No. 6648 and appropriating money from the Municipal Sewerage 1971 Construction Fund in aid thereof.
